author: {'steamid': '76561198186865498', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1580021573}
review:
This first sequel in the Metal Slug series is every bit as furious and chaotic as the original. This time you can play as one of four characters across the usual variety of wonderfully detailed and humorous landscapes as you blast seven shades of excrement out of enemy commandos. There are explosions and laughs galore as you battle your way through 6 stages teeming with baddies.

The level are a bit more eccentric this time with mummy's tombs and giant killer whales popping up. The finale even throws in an unexpected twist when you have to team up with your enemies to fight off an alien invasion, complete with and ID4 rip-off/homage ending.

Play this in the arcade and expect to be sent home penniless with your fingers all blistered, less so here on Steam. There are 15 achievements and no trading cards. The achievements will mostly pop through one play-though with a couple of others needing an extra grind. The final achievement, which expects you to get through the entire game without using a single continue is sadistic and impossible and spoils the overall gleeful mayhem and fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198870325711', 'num_games_owned': 211, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1659331423}
review: 合金弹头是承载了很多人童年回忆的一个系列游戏，其中尤为经典的合金弹头二更是让人欲罢不能，在第一部的基础上合金弹头二新加入了两名女角色的使用，同时在敌人的设计构思上更是融入了木乃伊外星人变异僵尸等增大游戏的趣味性，爽快的射击打击感以及以一敌百的成就感都成就了这款游戏位列史诗级别的童年游戏的宝座，同时双人模式更是让你一个游戏体验多种快乐，补票，值！

review:
[h1]NOSTALGIA[/h1]

Me compré el pack entero de [b]Metal Slug[/b] hace tiempo, pero es que no me pude resistir ya que es un juego que de chaval le dediqué bastantes monedas y tiempo en las recreativas de mi ciudad. author: {'steamid': '76561197997619576', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 166, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1571604625}
review:
Absolutely broken controller support, despite it saying full controller support. You will hold a direction down, and then it will reset you to neutral position. It will often not even register an input at all. You will be frustrated and questioning your sanity every 2 seconds if you want to play with a controller or arcade stick and, let's face it, this is a game not meant to be played on a keyboard. Ironically, because the controller support is so jank, the keyboard is the best way to play this, and that just shouldn't be. If you want to play this the way it's meant to be played, you will die to countless cheap deaths or a jump not being aimed correctly, and good luck with targets above or below you.

This applies to the other Metal Slug games on Steam as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997417745', 'num_games_owned': 1152, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 465, 'last_played': 1561676097}
review:
Дата выхода игры впервые 1998
Больше, лучше, веселее. Всё тот же старый добрый Металлический слизняк, в который крайне весело играть как в соляк, так и с другом.
Из минусов разве что скоротечность самой игры. Ну и, как обычно, хардкорность в плане сложности, благо жизни бесконечные.
Брать только с большой скидкой, так как веселье слишком разовое, хоть и очень годное.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092452420', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1636887161}
review: One of the greatest arcade platforming shooters of all time. However, be warned that the "arcade" mode's difficulties do not reflect the actual arcade version of the game. It is cool that they fixed the slow-down issues that the original faces, but they overcompensate and make it ridiculous in many parts. I would still recommend this game for fun, but if you want an authentic experience I find myself wishing I'd just kept playing an emulator.

author: {'steamid': '76561198176675135', 'num_games_owned': 3350, 'num_reviews': 2843, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1566283188}
review:
[h1]向日葵游戏评分：7分（1-10）[/h1]
街机移植的经典横版射击游戏，作为系列的第二部，继承了前作出色的手感、优秀的关卡设计、丰富的武器等优点，并增加了2名女性角色和更多的载具，游戏场景也更加丰富，有沙漠、金字塔、香港街头、火车追逐等等。
STEAM版本只是移植并非重置，街机中一些丢帧的场景和BUG依然存在，仅仅是增加了选关模式，也不能联机（STEAM上其余几作都可以）。游戏本身难度较高，但可以无限续关。
[h1]欢迎大家关注我们的鉴赏家：https://store.steampowered.com/curator/28763059[/h1]
[h1]关注微信公众号和头条号“向日葵游戏”获取更多资讯；官方微博：向日葵游戏评测[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198150169614', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1591805790}
review:
Spent 30-45 minutes to complete the Arcade Mode on Very Hard. Keyboard controls were not anywhere as bad as others made it out to be.

[b]Pros[/b]
[list]
[*]A legendary side scrolling run-and-gun that brings back nostalgia.
[*]Simple mechanics, mild difficulty, and more than enough bullets to keep you engaged
[/list]
[b]Cons[/b]
[list]
[*]$6.99. Other platforms have it for cheaper prices. I've also spent less on the original CD release.
[*]Slowdown/Lag occurrences from the original Neo-Geo MVS release exists in this Steam ported release.
[*]Achievement "Master of Metal Slug 2" is bugged since the release date. Last played 09 July 2019.
[*]A storyline for the Metal Slug universe exists, just not explained the games.
[/list]

Would recommend if it's on sale. Would recommend Metal Slug X otherwise.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991699715', 'num_games_owned': 1124, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1562356465}
review:
I played this game when I was like... six (6) or so, on an arcade machine, using coins. The difference then... well it made sense to play it with a joystick and 3 buttons. Years later, I don't have (own) a gamepad and the game still has the same identical design... it had like 30 years ago. For me it was an issue, but since I no longer need coins to play it... I could finish it in like 2 hours or so. The campaign is pure action, soldiers, grenades, bombs, planes, even tanks EVERYWHERE :P. Flying rockets, flying grenades, weapons and lots of bullets is all you need to see or know about how this game works. You, the player, against a gazillion of enemies, most of the times for me using a basic pistol (the worst one also probably :P), but from time to time also some pretty awesome weapons. The story is simple... kill everyone, kill a boss and go home at the end of the mission. The atmosphere is pretty good since there's a lot of stuff happening on the screen, there's no need to think or evade stuff (if you can do it thou :P), just use the pistol and kill everyone.  Some bosses are pretty interesting (by design), while some are pretty dumb. But it's ok :P

Now the best move if to play with a friend, since it helps (if he knows how to play that is :P). If you don't have any friends to play it with... no worries, infinite continue works also :P

Минусы:

review:
源作を完全再現できていない！ヽ(`Д´)ﾉ
の投稿が複数あったので購入躊躇しましたが
遊んでみると。。。

①難度が中程度なので遊戯快適。
②市販のUSB操縦桿を接續すると自動認識。そして釦設定も可能。
③画面の大きさ変更も自在。
④画質を粗くする。滑らかにすることもできます。
⑤實積獲得も容易。

秀作です。（*^_^*）

author: {'steamid': '76561198216887677', 'num_games_owned': 834, 'num_reviews': 152, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1688715738}
review:
Muito bom pra matar saudades dos fliperamas, porem, aqui eu tenho uma gtx 760 (muito alem do suficiente pra rodar esse jogo de maneira satisfatória) e não consegui rodar a 60 fps, ele rodou a 45 fps o tempo todo e com varios momentos apresentando lentidão... Deu pra jogar, mas é um port mal feito, vale se vc é fã e nostálgico, principalmente em promoção, comprei por 7 reais.
Fora esse problema de lentidão ocasional e não conseguir tirar o jogo desse pé no freio a 45 fps, a experiência nostalgica valeu, recomendo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198059364243', 'num_games_owned': 755, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1616544250}
review:
La secuela del Metal Slug Original, arreglo lo único en lo que fallaba la primera entrega, los controles ortopédicos se fueron, se agregaron Eri y Fio y los Jefes de nivel se volvieron más impresionantes. Se dice que esta versión estaba llena de Lag y en cierto modo es así, en la Arcade para mí nunca fue un problema realmente, debo decir que en esta versión se siente aún más, la emulación no es muy buena y se nota en el audio, los menús están igual de jodidamente feos.

De cualquier forma, es una buena compra, si puedes en oferta ya que el trabajo que hicieron no es realmente impecable y parece hecho de un día para otro.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983692596', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 361, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1553468083}
review: Неплохая такая аркада из старой школы. Простая, веселая, ностальгическая. В принципе можно найти и на эмуляторах, кому как нравится, но здесь не надо будет мучатся со сторонними прогами,да и адаптация к современным моникам присутствует. В свое время была успешной, сейчас достаточно примитивно смотрится. пройти на раз можно.

review: 《越南大戰2》 是一部的開啟「越南大戰系列」續集的最佳作品之一,不僅敵方多了不同的敵軍種類例如:地下墓穴的木乃伊與下水道的變種人與最後的外星人在遊戲上多了更多不同的樂趣,且武器種類更豐富化與載具上的新增,是一款值得推薦給大家的不敗遊戲。

author: {'steamid': '76561198128885199', 'num_games_owned': 2394, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1598049310}
review:
Gran entrega del aclamado titulo del genero arcade "Metal Slug". Nos presenta ciertos escenarios nuevos como algunos repetidos en la anterior entrega. Es una lastima que no este junto al "bundle" de la saga. Es recomendado al igual que las otras entregas. Es muy corto, dura aproximadamente 40 minutos pero en base a su contexto se justifica.
Tiene configuraciones de todo tipo para ser bastante viejo (video como la resolución, sonido y dificultad del juego como controles). Tiene pantalla compartida así que es la "hostia, joder".

author: {'steamid': '76561197987755126', 'num_games_owned': 1737, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 3300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1676500209}
review:
Metal Slug a toujours été une série fantastique.

Metal Slug a son charme et brille dans tous les aspects (gameplay, graphisme et bande son).
C'est court, mais c'est difficile. Si vous êtes encore un débutant, vous pouvez aussi joueren difficulté Easy.
Le mode multijoueur en ligne est un ajout intéressant.
Si vous n'avez encore essayé aucun des jeux Metal Slug et préférez le jeu sur PC, achetez-le et essayez-le.

Le seul vrai défaut et que le jeu lag, freeze par moment lorsqu'il y a des explosions et peu nuire a l'expérience

--> Attention il y a un succes bugué concernant finir le jeu sans utiliser de continue <--

author: {'steamid': '76561198027262074', 'num_games_owned': 81, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1546733166}
review:
After the installation I faced a series of technical issues. The native resolution of my monitor (1440p) doesn't work but halving the resolution (720p) works. The directional buttons/sticks of my controller stop working while an action button (firing, jumping, etc) is pressed so I have to use keyboard that doesn't have this issue. Looks like a bad port from another platform.

In my opinion the pixel graphics is too low resolution with today's standards and the art style (perhaps colour palette) makes things look blurry on some maps. The animations aren't fluid. The level tries to look 3D but moving objects/characters don't have shadows so it's difficult tell their height relative to the platform. It's difficult to tell which parts of the map serve as platforms and how to reach them. Shooting is possible only horizontally and vertically but the 3D-ish map has very curvy platforms and slopes (with angles like 10-15 degrees) so shooting the enemies can be a real pain in simple situations in which it should be easy.

The game seems to be a shoot 'em up comedy. The idea isn't bad but the technical, art and game mechanics related issues make it impossible for me to enjoy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198152410863', 'num_games_owned': 263, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 18642, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16963, 'last_played': 1542344688}
review:
[h1]*Como siempre digo: Mi crítica hacia cualquier vídeo juego, vá una vez que lo haya terminado y/o completado al [u]100%[/u] con sus logros [u]15/15.[/u][/h1]

Ahora sí, ¡Empecemos!

Metal Salug tiene una gran saga que se ganó en los salones recreativos de medio mundo al ser reconocido como uno de los mayores y mejores exponentes de los juegos de arcade y acción en 2D.

Metal Slug 2 es la segunda parte de el Metal Slug, que sigue en la misma onda hardcore y de gran dificultad, con el hándicap negativo que no es cooperativo, multijugador online, solo local, lo que le quita GRAN parte de su atractivo.

Sin duda la acción de este juego es realmente frenética, y no menos su dificultad, donde puede que algún maestro haya conseguido terminar el juego sin morir ni una sola vez cof cof (YO LO HICE x2) cooff coff..., pero ya te adelanto que es una tarea ardua, complicada y exigente, que te obligará a saber de memoria todos los niveles y por dónde aparecen cada uno de los enemigos en todo momento.

Su aspecto sonoro es algo más parco, pero acompaña perfectamente en todo momento, aunque tampoco prestarás demasiada atención entre tantos saltos, disparos y explosiones.
Y acá sí se luce realmente el juego, ya que los efectos de sonido si que ayudan, y de que manera, a meternos en situación totalmente.

Esta versión de Steam como dije antes, no contiene Cooperativo/Multiplayer online, el original en Arcade, sí lo tenia (cooperativo local).

Se añaden 2 personajes más, a lo que ahora podemos usar 4 PERSONAJES.

Tampoco hay más que decir, es una continuación directa sin prácticamente cambios, quizás algo más largo, pero igual en sus directrices.
Lo puntuo bajo, con una estrella menos por el gran ERROR de quitarle el multiplayer/cooperativo en la versión de STEAM.

Si ya conocías este gran clásico, debe bastarte con saber que la adaptación es muy correcta excepto el multiplayer que no contiene, y si no lo conocías y todo lo comentado te gusto, no lo dudes y hazte con un gran clásico del mundo de los vídeo juegos.

[u]Calificación[/u]:

[h1][u]9/10[/u] ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ✰[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561197969749884', 'num_games_owned': 2459, 'num_reviews': 1422, 'playtime_forever': 8580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8580, 'last_played': 1544169172}
review:
The Metal Slug series is one of the most legendary arcade game series of all time and for good reason. Metal Slug 2 doesn't change things up too much from its direct predecessor, but it has a wide graphical variety in its levels as well as interesting boss fights. Minor bullet hell elements, non-stop mayhem.

Truly shines in co-op.

review:
somehow this is an inferior version of ms2,

cons:
- many secret are removed not all but i did noticed their missing
- while on fat mode u cant shoot the machinegun diagonally like if u were playing ms1
- > the game some times stops and sends u 2 seconds in the future. as you can imagine that will kill you most times
- sometimes the game refuses to do actions like moving and shooting
- they didnt even tried to add something new to the game so its the same one but with missing stuff

pros:
i would like to say that the difficulty is a pro but some parts of the game feel unfair and the others are still easy the green bullets from the submarine boss are crazy fast also the alien ship lasers if they shoot you while u are mid air u re dead. the 3rd mission was quite balanced in difficulty

author: {'steamid': '76561197996644633', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 339, 'playtime_forever': 941, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 358, 'last_played': 1670778224}
review:
Classic arcade port, awesome platformer and shoot-em-up

Much like the other titles within this series I am still very pleased that these allow for Xinput controllers without any configuration and is a big plus.

What is the storyline anyways, All i know is I'm in Egypt? and killing all the natives because people are bad and we are good.

The slow downs/drops in frames is still disappointing seeing that I'm on a system that has way more than 128KB of ram...

One thing that was noted was the lack of online co-op but is not that big of an issue for me.

Solid title for a solid price, get it at full price or on sale!

author: {'steamid': '76561197966385727', 'num_games_owned': 997, 'num_reviews': 288, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1611596443}
review:
Why do people defend technical shortcomings in ports of retro console games, but flog modern companies when a PC release has any sign of console limitation?

The short of it is that this has "legacy" slowdown which just shouldn't exist anymore.  If any modern console game showed up on PC and had technical issues because it was a dump of a console game and not enough was done to hone it for PC hardware, it would be eaten alive.  This game is a good game from a "retro" era, however shortcomings due to "retro" technology should get ironed out when something is released on superior technology and a price tag is attached.  So despite liking the core game, I know realistically what it is, and I have to hit not recommended.

Not as good as Metal Slug 3, but still a good game. Just like all the currently available Steam/GOG versions of Metal Slug, this has slowdown and audio speedup/slowdown issues while more superior ports had neither. Again an option to switch Legacy mode on or off would have been great.

For some reason, they didn't put online multiplayer in this release while the other currently available Steam/GOG releases of Metal Slug have it.

Metal Slug X is this game with a lot of additions and tweaks made, so it does play differently.  X also has online multiplayer.

All of these ports also have one really odd bug: when the "GO" icon flashes on the screen, my character will just start running to the right and won't stop until death.  It's rare, but it happens.  I like these games, especially Metal Slug 3, but these ports aren't very good.

1の処理落ちは極端だったが2は処理落ちが完全になくなっている。これはこれでどうなのか。

author: {'steamid': '76561198204289897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 221, 'playtime_forever': 805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1532269244}
review:
姗姗来迟的合金弹头2代。

　　除了1代的队长 Marco 和墨镜男 Tarma，又增加了 Eri 和 Fio 两个妹子，于是所有人都只选妹子(･∀･) 会发气功波的一文字百太郎也让玩家津津乐道。

　　这一代的战斗更加魔幻，木乃伊、自爆怪、外星人等等敌人让人印象深刻。结局动画里面驾驶战斗机撞毁飞碟的一幕显然是致敬了《独立日》。

　　相信很多人最喜欢的是第4关，因为可以吃很多东西变成大胖子。

　　而在第4关开头和第1关出现过的白发西服老人，据介绍（B站av14485567）是以SNK当时的社长高堂良彦为原型，在游戏中叫做杜克·高堂，而他身边的箱子里装的就是SNK的最新卡带，所以被玩家捡走之后他才会做出吃了一惊的动作。

　　2代上Steam比1、3、X更晚，所以都没注意到，今天偶然发现了，于是一个人通关了。有机会再联机吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198210022420', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 270, 'playtime_forever': 1369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 624, 'last_played': 1556372260}
review:
[h1][b][u]OVERALL[/u]: 8/10[/b][/h1]
  
  Great game, from a totally cult franchise, METAL SLUG. The second opus picks up right where Metal Slug 1 left us and adds quite a bit more spice to the sauce. I still prefer the first one but it's still an amazing 2D shooter / platform for anybody not familiar with its even better counterparts METAL SLUG 1 and 3.


[h1][b][u]GAMEPLAY[/u]: 9.5/10[/b][/h1]

 Get yourself a good pad or an arcade stick, boot the game on normal difficulty with 20 credits max and see how you fare against this challenge ! METAL SLUG 2 is like any other METAL SLUG: fast, precise, brutal and unforgiving. Only projectiles, moving tanks/vehicles can hurt you, this is vastly different from your usual 2D game where touching the sprite of an enemy hurts/kills you, this creates a trully unique gameplay. Hectic and chaotic as can be. Combine that with a whole array of weapons, "slugs" ranging from a camel with a mounted laser turret, to your classic metal slug (tank), to a top end military jet and now you've got yourself a game ! You have got to be tight and aware at all time, classic yet masterfully executed and with that METAL SLUG flair on top of it !

[h1][b][u]LEVEL DESIGN[/u]: 7/10[/b][/h1]
 
 Not much to say here, unlike metal slug 3, the level design is quite straight forward, no branching paths, just a classic 2D side scroller feel. Nothing bad , nothing astonishing.

[h1][b][u]VISUAL & ART[/u]: 10/10[/b][/h1]
  
10/10 that's right ! Art style is top notch, animations are top notch, sprites are from another world, the overall satirical spoof of a dystopian nazi army gone straight insane is so hilariously depicted that once you play this game you won't be able to forget this game's art style. This is the uncontested strong point of any METAL SLUG opus. SNK truely gave their best and it shows! Just a beautiful game a notch under 1 and 3 but 2 and X are still worth of a perfect score.

[h1][b][u]SOUND & MUSIC[/u]: 8/10[/b][/h1]

Sound design is great, picking a shiny items with a sparkly crystal sound or a power up announced by an over the top announcer, blowing things up with nades, zapping MARS people away with the Laser gun, blasting an entire screen with 1 single banging shothun blast, all these satisfying sounds of retro gaming are here, perfectly suiting the visuals. Music is uptempo and on the heavy side also suiting the theme of the metal slug. 

[h1][b][u]REPLAYABILITY[/u]: 6/10[/b][/h1]

If you're not a speedrunner or a high scorer then the replayability drops quite a bit... Like all Metal slugs, this game provides great challenges, up to you to beat them ! But, seriously who the fuck can 1 credit any metal slug ?!?! Not me. Yet still coming back to these games and trying to beat them under 10 credits or so while savouring great art style, animations and gameplay is always fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561197996633876', 'num_games_owned': 1153, 'num_reviews': 370, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1711631973}
review:
It just so happens that Metal Slug 2 may be just as good as the first. Maybe even better, since you can choose from one of four characters, which isn't that big a deal or anything but it's pretty cool.

Once again, what can I even say about Metal Slug? You run, shoot, and desperately try not to get hit by anything because if you do, you're dead. Three lives, as many or as few continues as you like. You get new powerups in the form of expendable weapons you drop as soon as you're out of ammo.

The graphics and animation are both fantastic. Everything looks good, sure, but it's pretty amazing how smooth the animation is. SNK truly are masters at this kind of thing.

The game sounds good, all the guns sound powerful and satisfying, and there's some really great music tracks. It all sounds very 'arcade' but that's part of the charm of this game, really.

Game's real good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074284973', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1768, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1628847191}
review:
Toto je dobre urobený remake na vynikajúcu oldschoolovku.
Neaká tá klasická arkádovka nikdy neomrzí, aj keď hru dohrajete tak furt sa môžeťe pokúšať splniť všeliaké achievementy.
Narozdiel od originál Metal Slugu 2, v tejto hre máte aj výber obtiažností, podľa mna je to ale zbytočnosť pretože potom nebudete mať taký dobrý pocit keď zabijete neakého najviac mocného bossa, ale hej to je len moj názor.
Narozdiel od UI (User-Interface) a výberu misií je hra prerobená tak ako bola v originále.
Je to super hra ktorú kludne môžeťe dohrať za asi tak 1 hodinu.
Dal by som tejto hre 9.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198140790203', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 4582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1678, 'last_played': 1705076587}
review:
I recommend this to people who:
- Like super-detailed 2D sprite animation
- Run n gun games
- Don't give a fuck about anything other than gameplay and mechanics (music still deas tho)
- Don't have Metal Slug X or Metal Slug 3 on steam
- Have Metal Slug X and Metal Slug 3 on steam and loved the fuck atta them games
- Want to play Metal Slug 2 without slowdown (setting this up on PC can be a pain in the ass).

I DON'T recomend this to people who:
- achievement hunt.  1 of the achievements if bugged/cannot unlock.
- like to play this game with the original slowdown (slowdown is removed.  Don't use this version to speedrun).
- want to play this online (the online is shit)
- Want to conquer leaderboards (hacked leaderboards)
- Own Metal Slug X.  This is basically a beta Metal Slug X

I love MS games, but having a broken achievement killed the fun for me.  I feel like I got stiffed.  The achievement is fucking hard to get too...

author: {'steamid': '76561197970841939', 'num_games_owned': 1502, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1498780244}
review: The game is a classic. One of the absolute best run and gun arcade games ever made, and one of the best of the Metal Slug series, maybe second only to Metal Slug 3 (and possibly X). That said, I can't really recommend this particular port for anyone other than people that simply want to own all the Metal Slug games on Steam. For some reason this port has awful slowdown (like, significantly worse than what was present in the original arcade version) and even worse audio issues. The speed and pitch of the music and sound effects seems to just go all over the place at random, not even in sync with the gameplay slowdown. Easily the worst version of Metal Slug 2 I've played, and I'd say pass and just get Metal Slug X instead, if you want a similar experience on Steam. And if you are dead set on playing 2 on your PC, there are much much better ways of doing just that.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960620321', 'num_games_owned': 1680, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1497638358}
review:
As we all know Metal Slug X is the definitive version of Metal Slug 2, so why was this version released here? Maybe sometimes you want to experience the original and comapre it and MG2 was a improvement over the first game, even with the bugs that got fixed in MGX.
Again, another classic but a very bad port, this time we again have some slowdowns but the biggest problem is the lack of online multiplayer. MS1, MSX, MS3...they all have online multiplayer, so what happened here? Too lazy? Too greedy? Thinking that everybody would go to MSX? I don't really understand it.
It also has some slow-down issues and it's only worth if you wanna go Solo, otherwise get Metal Slug X, it's the improved version with online multiplayer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198178463779', 'num_games_owned': 144, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1504033779}
review:
Olá pessoal. Este comentário está disponível de forma igual entre todos os Metal Slug’s clássicos aqui presentes na steam, o motivo disso é porque os jogos são praticamente idênticos com leves mudanças técnicas e algumas mudanças de elementos de gameplay.

 A primeira coisa que vem a minha cabeça quando penso em Metal Slug é nostalgia, e realmente essa é a sensação ótima ao joga-ló, principalmente quando jogado com amigos.

 As negatividades do game foi as seguintes:

-O preço é bastante exagerado para um jogo em que você zera em menos de 1 hora e que não contém muitas atividades para se fazer depois de finalizar.
-Modo online não existe praticamente, ninguém na face da Terra habita no lobby do multiplayer, simplesmente desagradável.


Enfim, é um jogo recomendável quando estiver em promoção.

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198042460330', 'num_games_owned': 2704, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1495130283}
review:
Metal Slug 2 presents a smooth port of one of the most classic arcade sidescrollers available. MS2's combat is difficult to master, although not difficult to grasp. The mechanics are sneaky, and beating some of the bosses take advanced tactics. I have so far only played through this game on single player, but have no fear - with all of the difficulties available, you and your friends will have no issue encountering a challenge.

The art in this game is fantastic, and offers a classic arcade sprite feel (for good reason). I would suggest playing this game with a controller, as it simply makes life easier. The keyboard makes your life sooo much easier when you assign custom keybinds, for real. I'm sure an arcade joystick would be just as agreeable, although I myself don't have one. 

Metal Slug 2 remains a must play for people of all ages. Whether you're introducing a child to the roots of modern gaming, or simply revisiting an old classic for nostalgia purposes, MS2 doesn't fail to deliver. Although short, MS2 offers enough replayability for this not to matter. I myself really enjoyed my playthrough of this game, although I admittedly played on easy and probably died at least 2000000020020202222 times. I fully plan to revisit and 100% this masterpiece.

author: {'steamid': '76561198285330266', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1491087766}

author: {'steamid': '76561198075644427', 'num_games_owned': 811, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1493834978}
review:
Olá pessoal. Este comentário está disponível de forma igual entre todos os Metal Slug’s clássicos aqui presentes na steam, o motivo disso é porque os jogos são praticamente idênticos com leves mudanças técnicas e algumas mudanças de elementos de gameplay.

A primeira coisa que vem a minha cabeça quando penso em Metal Slug é nostalgia, e realmente essa é a sensação ótima ao joga-ló, principalmente quando jogado com amigos.

Sobre o porte para pc, no meu caso todos os Metal Slug’s estão lagando tanto no solo como no multiplayer, isso realmente é chato, pois a emulação foi mal feita. Mas vale salientar que ainda dá para jogar tranquilamente.

Terminando, qualquer Metal Slug para os pc’s não traz nenhuma novidade para as pessoas que o jogaram antigamente, mas uma coisa é certa, eles continuam divertindo do mesmo jeito comparado a época dos arcades. A franquia é um exemplo de jogos que sabem envelhecer bem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031617164', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 239, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1492509441}
review:
메탈 슬러그 2

오락실용 총잡이 게임. 사이드스크롤링 플랫폼 슈팅게임임.
이 게임(시리즈)의 특징은 무기나 폭탄 등 여러 아이템을 추가하거나 바꿔 낄 수 있고,
탱크나 비행기같이 멋있는 탈 것들이 플레이를 더 재밌게 만들어 줌.
또 타격감이 확실해서 미친 듯이 쏴대고 싶은 충동이 생기게 하며,
스피디하고 현란한 게임플레이는 피가 끓게 해줌.
무엇보다 가장 큰 장점은 이제는 거의 표준이 된, 콘트라(혼두라)와 같이 자유로운 에임에 있다고 생각함.

메탈 슬러그 2에 대해 이야기 해보자면 메탈 슬러그 1에 비해 많이 발전했음. 
1편에서는 적이 군인 밖에 안나오고 보스도 전차나 전투기같이 좀 평범한데,
2편에서는 희한하거나 신기한 적과 보스가 많이 나와 훨씬 재밌어짐.
그리고 이후 게임들도 플레이 방식은 메탈 슬러그 2에 비해 크게 다르지 않은걸 보면
이 게임이 시리즈의 초석을 닦았다고 봐도 될 듯.

요즘 다시 해보면 플탐이 굉장히 짧은 게임이라는 생각도 들음.
그렇지만 그건 이 게임이 애초에 오락실용이기도 하고, 나온 지도 꽤 됐고,
내가 이 게임을 너무 많이 해본 탓도 있는 듯.

위에서 말한 것 이외에도 메탈 슬러그라는 게임을 굉장히 인기있게 만들어 준 다양한 요소가 있음.
사실 이 게임은 유치원때 부터 했던건데 ㅋㅋ
오랜만에 해봐도 재밌었음.
근데 왠지 모르겠지만 이 스팀 버전이 내 컴에서는 2P로 하면 작동이 잘 안됨.

졸잼 추천

author: {'steamid': '76561198108191284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1485796655}
review:
As a sequel, Metal Slug 2 adds a couple new features that make it fresh: There are now 4 unique characters to play as, more vehicles, weapons, and some new transformations for your character. 

Despite these additions, the similar length and overall gameplay leave Metal Slug 2 vastly underwhelming. Comedy and level theming is a lot stronger though, which is a big plus to its enjoyment. 

As for its port once again, the title screen is a travesty. It’s less confusing to navigate this time around but nothing else has been improved. Online co-op is confusingly missing from this port. Disappointing since the original game received this feature. But leader boards make a return which is always nice for more competitive play.

There's nothing overly negative about it. So, it gets a recommendation; but not by much.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044081373', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1483736535}
review:
Mostly based on the Humble Store release of Metal Slug 2. So don't let my Steam stats fool you.

Metal Slug 2 is every bit as good as Metal Slug 3, but not as punishing. While the Humble Store release features installers for Windows, Mac, and Linux and is DRM-free, the Steam version features leaderboards, Achievements, and cloud saving. XInput gamepad support and modest hardware requirements round out this really cool package.

Whether it be via Steam or via the Humble Store release, you owe it to yourself to have Metal Slug 2 in your game library.

review:
While it's nice to have legal versions of these games available, I wish the port jobs weren't as lazy or bare-boned like these tend to be.

In my experience, there were odd slowdowns and the music seems to have difficulty playing sometimes, as if it is getting stretched out in places.

Top this off with the bare minimum of graphics options and the lazy, lazy achievements (80% of which I got on my first playthrough).

author: {'steamid': '76561197999498546', 'num_games_owned': 8364, 'num_reviews': 236, 'playtime_forever': 380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1478884723}
review:
First of all. Why the thump down? 
The game itself is good and plays as smooth and fun as the other METAL SLUG Games. But since there is METAL SLUG X, I can’t recommend on buying METAL SLUG 2. It is a dumped down version of METAL SLUG X. MSX and MS2 are the same games, but MSX has more enemies, a bigger arsenal of guns and more compared to MS2. So just buy METAL SLUG X and you will get the better package overall :)


But nonetheless METAL SLUG 2 is very good game for itself. I mainly bought it to complete my Collection of the Series on Steam. Like the other games of the franchise, MS2 is a good classical 2D Arcade shooter. The game runs smooth, and the gameplay is fast and fun. The game offers you a wide variety of guns and vehicles to fight against your enemies. 
So if you buy it, you will get a classical, but fun arcade shooter. 
But as said above, I recommend you to get METAL SLUG X instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999363278', 'num_games_owned': 3013, 'num_reviews': 258, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1479061252}
review:
Excellent game, but unfortunately kind of a  shoddy port.
There are slowdown and sound issues in this port, but that has come to be expected of dotEmu ports of NeoGeo titles.

The sound quality is also weird. Like in the other DotEmu metal slug ports, it seems to get desynchronized and then speeding uyp to compensate. That is quite annoying since Metal Slug is a series with fantastic sound design and that takes me out of it.

Fantastic gameplay, but  it IS quite unfir. With good reason, too, since this was made as a  token taker arcade. Still, not the best in the metal slug series (that is probably tied for me between X and 3, even though 3 does get overlong and too hard in the last levels).

All in all, not the best way to experience Meal Slug, but very worth getting even with the dotEmu port issues.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970337312', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1478692512}
review:
Segunda parte de el metal slug, que sigue en la misma onda hardcore y de gran dificultad, con el hándicap negativo que no es cooperativo multijugador online, solo local, lo que le quita gran parte de su atractivo.

Exactamente igual de las máquinas de antaño, exige una gran destreza para terminartelo con vidas limitadas, sino, como todos estos juegos, son un paseo.

Tamnpoco hay más que decir, es una continuación directa sin practicamente cambios, quizás algo más corto, pero igual en sus directrices. Le puntuo bajo por el gran error del multi

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198064153655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1687694539}
review:
★★★★★★★★★★ 10/10

 Now this was the Metal Slug I remember to be. Humans and aliens to fight against. It was cool. It felt a bit unfair towards the middle but I realized that was the intention to make the battles more chaotic, which made the whole war thrilling.

+) New vehicles.
+) More and frequent ammos for special weapons.
+) You can reach the items that you can't reach, above, by jumping and touching it with your head.
+) The number of unforseen happenings increased, therefore making the game much more fun.
+) I was surprised to see how dramatic the story was, even without any dialogues. A lot of game developers could learn from here.
+) More interesting enemy types.

-) You still can't shoot opposite direction in mid-air.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033995360', 'num_games_owned': 2161, 'num_reviews': 441, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1486920034}
review: Mourir pour recommencer. Mourir encore pour recommencer encore. Sans adhérer à toutes les déviances de Tom Cruise, il y a des jours ou des jeux qui nous font penser que le bonhomme au nez d’aigle n’a pas tort sur tout. Metal Slug 2, qui n’a que le mérite d’offrir une nouvelle aventure, un nouveau bestiaire et de nouveaux panoramas, nous raconte pourquoi le premier Metal Slug était si bien. D’une beauté à t’en faire regretter l’apparition de la 3D dans le jeu vidéo, cette série de jeux d’action est un bijou de run ’N gun, la meilleure des raisons de coopérer à deux sur un canapé. Une action débridée qui nous régale de ses animations superbes. Les vies et les morts s’enchaînent mieux que dans Edge of Tomorrow et il faudra être un bionique pour arracher le succès qui nous nargue en nous laissant croire qu’il est possible d’aller au bout sans utiliser de continue ; alors on essaie, on y met du coeur et on y pleure des litres de sueur mais rien n’y fait. On meurt, on vit, on meurt encore ; étrangement, au contraire d’en être déçu ou frustré on y prend un plaisir sadique. What a lovely day. La bave aux lèvres à l’idée de la prochaine partie, on réalise sans s’en alarmer que SNK a fait de nous sa Full Metal SIut.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013844507', 'num_games_owned': 942, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1526104809}

author: {'steamid': '76561198220223668', 'num_games_owned': 136, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1472054414}
review:
Metal Slug 2 isn't awful but it's the weakest game in the series by far, and SNK later released an updated version of it called Metal Slug X. I'd say that there's really no reason to buy this old and inferior version of the game. A) Metal Slug X is on Steam, so you can just play as that, as it's the superior version of Metal Slug 2. B) The port job by DotEMU isn't great. Metal Slug 2 definitely had plenty of slowdown when it was an arcade game - it was kind of notorious for it - but this Steam port has even *more* slowdown, and the visuals just look disappointingly blurry. C) This is 7 bucks or almost 8 dollars CAD, which I think is way too much to ask for a sloppy port of an unspectacular game. If you have any other way to play video games other than Steam, you can surely find an SNK collection or Metal Slug anthology that has this game on it along with other entries in the series.

If you *do* decide to get this version, it's got the same Metal Slug gameplay that everybody loves from the original, plus you get to pilot a couple of new vehicles and there are new weapons. This game also has a bit of globe-trotting in it, as you'll go to stages all around the world. The issue of cultural diversity is, of course, handled with all of the sensitivity that you can expect of a 90s arcade action game. It's fun for what it is and it's a good multiplayer diversion for 40 minutes, but the other games in the series are way better. I think this game is less dynamic and exciting than the original Metal Slug and nowhere near as epic as Metal Slug 3. It also has the worst final mission in the series, in my opinion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041478634', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1518273591}
review:
Metal Slug 2 souffrait sur NeoGeo d'énormes ralentissement. C'est pourquoi un remake nommé Metal Slug X a vu le jour, en augmentant le nombre d'armes et en modifiant légèrement les missions tout en ayant un framerate assez stable

Le portage de ce jeu NeoGeo est excellent car les ralentissement sont très rare et permettent de jouer à ce jeu dans de bonnes conditions. A la différence de la version original. Cela dit si je ne recommande pas le jeu c'est pour une simple et bonne raison. Les différents Metal Slug sont vendu 8 euros (prix que je trouve un peu cher pour ce que c'est bien que ce n'est pas une arnaque), mais ce Metal Slug 2 est vendu "seulement" 7 euros car il n'a pas de modes online ! Il est la tout le problème, pourquoi ne pas avoir intégré le mode online déjà développé sur les 3 titres de la série précédemment porté ?

C'est juste incompréhensible...

Tant qu'il n'y aura pas de multijoueur online, l'avis restera négatif. Je recommande plutôt Metal Slug X qui est pratiquement le même jeu mais ayant ce mode très important. Pour les fans, il existe un bundle avec le 1, 3 et le X qui permet d'en avoir 3 pour le prix de 2

author: {'steamid': '76561198052965201', 'num_games_owned': 1046, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 268, 'last_played': 1574283121}
review:
God, I love these games. It's everything you expect from a classic arcade, run-gun quartermuncher. The game seems to have been ported pretty well, at least for single player, but the menu's are a mess, local multiplayer didn't accept 2 controllers on my PC or quite simply didn't work AT ALL. These seem to be emulation issues that could easily have been caught in any half-competent QA-division, but then again the entire menu UI and the design of its backgrounds is about as low-budget as they come. At least it's not going to take you a couple dozen quarters to get through the game like with an arcade cabinet!
This second game sees the return of Gal. Donald Morden and his army of faux-nazis, but also introduces the race of martians that will be a recurring enemy throughout the series. It still has the same wacky designs and the exquisite sprite details that the first one had.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028724797', 'num_games_owned': 1480, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1467033630}
review:
My voto: 6/10

Questo è un buon gioco 2d platform di azione. La grafica è carina (ottima se si pensa a quanto sia vecchio il gioco) e il gameplay è divertente. Peccato che è un port dall'arcade, e quindi il gioco lo si finisce senza fatica, visto che si hanno a disposizione crediti infiniti. 

Per fortuna ti dice quanti ne hai usati per vincere il gioco (45 per me), ma avrei preferito che ci fosse un sistema di checkpoint e un numero limitato di crediti utilizzabili. 

Be', almeno ho potuto giocare questo buon vecchio gioco fino alla fine che non mi ha deluso. 

Consigliato solo ai nostalgici.

+ Buona grafica vecchio stile
+ Divertente

- Crediti infiniti
- Calo di framerate
- Brutti effetti sonori

3. É fácil zerar gastando 188790040 vidas mas, difícil passar apenas com 1 continue.

4. Gameplay agradável, presente em toda série metal slug.

author: {'steamid': '76561198127725117', 'num_games_owned': 1561, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 624, 'last_played': 1632601818}
review:
やる気と愛のなさがひしひしと伝わってくる移植作品.

・処理落ち再現無し
オリジナルは画面の密度が少しでも高くなると処理落ちが多発することが特徴的でしたが、それはゲームのテンポが下がる一方で難易度の高い場面では敵の弾避けに集中できたりで、ノーコンティニュー・ノーミスクリアを目指す一発即死のこのゲームにおいてゲームバランスの重要なファクターでした。
他ハードでの移植では処理落ちを再現した上で、おまけとして処理落ちオフにできるものもありますが、Steam版は処理落ちオフでしか遊べません。はっきり言って別ゲーです。

・オンラインCOOP無し
他作品(初代,X,3)では実装されてたのに何故削ったのか。

・Steamトレカ無し
これも他作品では実装されてたのに何故削ったのか。

他、バグに関して報告されてから数ヶ月経っても何のアップデートもアナウンスもありません(これは2に限ったことではないですが)

Steam版3やXも移植作品として褒められたものではありませんでしたが、どうしてもPCで遊びたい・Steamのフレンドと遊びたいという目的では価値はありました。しかしオンラインCOOPも無く、そもそもメタルスラッグ2とは言いがたいこの製品に親指を立てることはできません。

author: {'steamid': '76561198044267428', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1625510146}
review:
I'm a hardcore Metal Slug fan, here's my pros and cons:

Pros:
*Most of the slowdowns in the arcade version were fixed in this port, with the exception of the wobbly bridge in the final mission which I can't complain since X also has the same problem.

Cons:
*The port felt rushed, no online play and the menu was kind of mediocre compared to the ports of 1, X and 3.
*This might be nitpicking, but most of the achievements have the same name as the ones in the other ports, that's 0/10 in originality to SNK Playmore.

Despite more cons than pros, I would recomend this if you prefer 2 over X because the already mentioned slowdown fixes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021757575', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 656, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1461017913}

author: {'steamid': '76561198049701098', 'num_games_owned': 3699, 'num_reviews': 832, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1461011046}
review:
Well, I guess I'll take on the task of being the first reviewer to give a thumbs down to Metal Slug 2, but that's okay; none of the other reviews here mention most of what I'm going to be talking about, nor are they in-depth. So take great consideration when picking up this title. I'm a massive fan of the Metal Slug franchise, and while there's nothing exactly bad about Metal Slug 2 itself, we already have this game on Steam. Us, the fans, have been waiting almost a year for the next installment to be ported to Steam, was it 6? No. How about the amazing 7? Nah. Even 5? Nope. We get shafted with the inferior version of Metal Slug X. This game is already on Steam, just under a different name.

Yes, that's correct, inferior. SNK originally released Metal Slug X to be an updated version of Metal Slug 2, because there were bugs, glitches, and other issues with the arcade chips that were hard to fix. So not only did they fix those issues with X, they improved upon the game itself, and even added more content. There is a difference of 5% between X and 2, and it's mostly negligible. The bosses are the same for the most part, save for the last boss fight which is a good 10-15 minutes SHORTER in Metal Slug 2 than it is in X. Let me also take time to mention that there is no online co-op mode in this game, but there is in X! Even if you do not own X or 2 at this point, you should just go with X since it's longer, better, and has online co-op.

There is absolutely no reason to purchase Metal Slug 2, unless you're a die hard fan with $8 to throw down because you absolutely love the franchise and wish to support it. However, even as one of these die-hards, and having urged and encouraged many people to purchase these titles on Steam so that we can get more in the future, I feel incredibly shafted. Not only over the long wait, but knowing that there's less of a chance of DotEmu and SNK porting the remainder of the series if there isn't enough support to earn back what they at least put into spending to port these titles, only for them to give us something we already have instead of putting their time and resources into something that we don't have.

As for Metal Slug itself? The franchise is one of the greatest run-and-guns of all time. The series has a varying amount of characters, but in Metal Slug 2 and X you get your choice between four. There are six levels in this game, all of which will take you around 40-50 minutes to complete in total. The bosses are big, the levels are greatly detailed, you have a decent variety of weapons that will randomly drop for you such as the heavy machine gun and flamethrower, and the soundtrack is awesome, though not as great as in X. I have gone into more detail in the past about what Metal Slug is in general, and I recommend to take a look at my reviews for Metal Slug and Metal Slug X for that if you are not familiar with the series.

So the bottom line here is to just avoid Metal Slug 2 unless you're crazy about the series, or unless you want to keep supporting DotEmu and SNK's ports of the franchise. It's the same game as X, and if you don't have either just get X instead since it's the updated, longer, better, and has online co-op version of 2. I never thought I'd have something overly negative to say about Metal Slug, but I really cannot believe DotEmu and SNK have released this instead of any of the other 4 remaining titles. As well, I've seen a lot of people complaining about the "slow downs" and "FPS drops", as in the review sections of the other Metal Slug games, these people just have no clue what they're talking about. The game runs at 60 FPS, and the slow downs are intentional; as it was in the Mega Man Legacy Collection. It's how the games played in their original form, and these are true-to-original, great ports.

[h1]Rating: [b]3.0/5.0[/b] - Average, can take it or leave it.[/h1]

review:
[h1]OH MY GUSH! [/h1]
This game is totally worth it like I cannot even describe it to ye
Like this is how every "Shoot em' up" should have been made and the art style don't even make me mention it it's phenomenal
Like this game is one of the best of it's kind from the art style to the gameplay to how the leader of ze nazi dies in the end :D
Though I have 3 negatives
- [b] THE AWFUL OPTIMIZATION [/b]
[i]I am running an 4th gen i7 and 750ti and not even playing 1080p (I was playing 960p 4:3 aspect ratio streched) and the FPS got chopped in half in tense areas with 10+ enemies (SO MANY BULLETS! O_O) also I noticed some occasional frame drops for like .33 of a second maybe due to my 5400RPM harddrive[/i]
- [b]No seperate volume sliders! [/b]
[i]WHY? Even though I like the music in this game I would like to listen to my own tracks while playing this [/i]
- [b]The "Very Hard" mode [/b]
[i]It isn't even hard and I hate the it doesn't punish you by removing the "Continue" option after every third death [/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561197973270891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1460805602}
review: To fans of retro ' Run & Gun ' games from the Neo Geo era, this deserves to be in your collection. Like previous releases of the series on Steam, Metal Slug 2 is a solid port worthy of your time, on a new mission to stop General Morden in his 2nd attempt for world domination. It can get overwhelming being shot at from all directions, but that just heightens the fun. Expect great art design with hilarious moments, and bonkers end of level bosses. All Metal Slug games are classics of 24-bit graphical greatness, each made more memorable by 6 distinctly different stages.
